urls.title: Home ‚Äî Climate-ADAPT
urls.description: The European Climate Data Explorer provides interactive access to many climate indices from the Copernicus Climate Change Service in support of climate change adaptation. The European Climate and Health Observatory provides access to a wide range of relevant publications, tools, websites and other resources related to climate change and health. The database contains quality checked information and is annotated by climate adaptation experts with keywords. Climate change has complex effects on the bio-physica
